alert.note: Alert for Monmouth; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:07PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OCEAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MONMOUTH COUNTIES... At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lakewood, or 7 miles north of Toms River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Jackson, Howell, Beachwood, Manasquan, Point Pleasant Beach, Seaside Heights, Lakehurst, Farmingdale, Mantoloking, Leisure Village, Allenwood, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Cedar Glen West, Leisure Village East, Dover Beaches South and Holiday City-Berkeley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 24 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 80 and 100. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
